subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Andy Murray beat David Ferrer, 7-5, 6-4, to win the Shanghai Masters, ensuring that he will move past Roger Federer to take No. 3 in the ATP rankings.
snippet: The defending champion Andy Murray beat David Ferrer, 7-5, 6-4, to win the Shanghai Masters, ensuring that he will move past Roger Federer to take No. 3 in the ATP rankings.
